    How the advanced inbound process with put-away works

    What is the process of put away?


    Put away is the process of storing goods in a warehouse. It is a key component of warehouse management and logistics, as it involves picking items from inventory and placing them on a pallet or shelf.
    Put away begins with receiving goods into your warehouse, either through shipments or via an internal pull system.
    Open supply chain 3 65 and Log in to mobile device.
    Now when I click on the Put away, a new screen appears with bin codes select a bin or scan its code, now you see the information regarding the header of the item inside this bin.
    Swiping right, label printing.
    By swiping right, you can navigate to the item details. Click on the triangle icon in order to see all the item details like item number, description, variant, identifier, unit of measure and etc.
    At the bottom of the screen there is a print button. Click to see the printer options. Select a label, select a printer and enter the quantity to be printed.
    Clicking on item
    If you have a scanner just scan the item's code. If you don’t have a scanner, click on the item.
    Click Item number A, 880 and you see that we have 2 processes, one is take and other is place, here i put 5 and click on put-away.
    In this screen you see item tracking for put away, also there is information regarding item, Description, bin and quantity.It is important that how many we take from here and then place to somewhere else. When you see a selected item with orange background it means that we are taking items, when click on place select where to place the item in which location or bin select one and click next,
    Show the item number with item details, click next or scan the code, and the place screen is visible click place and chose quantity add quantity to then click done or scan the code to place the put-away item .

    Now you see on the right side of item 0 to take, 5 placed and total 22 item.

    Items placed in selected location.

    In a warehouse, put away refers to all the processes that happen between receiving goods from vendors and having them all put away into their assigned places.

    Having a put away system simplifies the process of storing items, reduces the risk of misplacing or losing items, and keeps your warehouse clean and organized.

    below a video to help users understand the steps visually:
